title: Software Engineer
description: I'm proudly working as a Software Engineer at Minim, an AI driven WiFi Management and IoT Security platform.
accomplishments: Lead the development of the second version of the company's mobile application, which introduced an entirely new UI/UX as well as a variety of new features.
Created a custom re-usable component library for the comapny's mobile app based off the company's design guidelines.
Introduced an automated build system which would allow for automated deployments of the company's mobile app to the play store and the app store.
responsibilities: Work in an agile development team and attent daily stand ups, sprint planning meeting and sprint retrospectives.
Design and develop new features using technologies like Vue.js and Ruby on Rails.
Coordinate and work with a diverse group of people, randing from UI/UX designers to embedded engineers.
